column4: hello can anyone help me in configuring my ethernet card with dhcp client
mirja: card comes with nvidia chipset
mirja, right now i am connected through wireless data card, but want to configure through ethernet card
mirja, my laptop is compaq presario v6608au with nvidia chipset, when i do lspci for ethernet card i get this message 00:0a.0 Ethernet controller: nVidia Corporation Unknown device 054c (rev a2)
what is the need of it?
thanks for the information. I get this information for ethernet card, 00:0a.0 Ethernet controller: nVidia Corporation MCP67 Ethernet (rev a2)
I have to configure the network with dhcp. but somehow its not working with ethernet card
how do i check if forcedeth is loaded?
sorry I did not understand "pastebin your interface files"?
# This file describes the network interfaces available on your system
